places.name: Central Park Dog Run

places.description: Large fenced off-leash area in Central Park with separate sections for large and small dogs, plus water fountains.

places.description: Popular fenced dog run in the heart of Greenwich Village, frequented by locals and their pets daily.

places.name: Prospect Park Dog Beach
places.description: Off-leash area with lake access where dogs can swim and play in the water during designated hours.

places.name: Madison Square Park Dog Run

places.description: Well-maintained fenced dog run in historic Madison Square Park with separate areas for different sized dogs.

places.name: Brooklyn Bridge Park Dog Run

places.description: Modern dog run with stunning Manhattan skyline views and excellent facilities for dogs of all sizes.

places.name: Tompkins Square Dog Run
places.address: Tompkins Square Park, New York, NY 10009
places.description: Historic first official dog run in NYC, featuring separate areas for large and small dogs in vibrant East Village.

places.name: Westville
places.description: Farm-to-table restaurant with sidewalk seating that actively welcomes dogs and provides fresh water.

places.description: Italian restaurant with beautiful waterfront terrace dining where well-behaved dogs are welcomed.

places.name: Extra Virgin
places.description: Mediterranean restaurant with charming outdoor garden seating that welcomes dogs and provides water bowls.

places.name: Buttermilk Channel
places.description: New American restaurant with sidewalk seating where dogs are welcome and receive complimentary water.

places.name: Blue Bottle Coffee
places.description: Specialty coffee roaster with outdoor seating where dogs are welcome and water bowls are available upon request.

places.description: Local coffee roaster with sidewalk cafe seating that welcomes dogs and provides fresh water.

places.name: Joe Coffee
places.description: Neighborhood coffee shop with outdoor seating where local dog owners regularly bring their pets.

places.name: Toby's Estate Coffee
places.description: Australian coffee roaster with spacious outdoor seating area where dogs are welcomed with water bowls.

places.name: La Colombe Coffee
places.description: Artisanal coffee roaster with outdoor seating where dogs are welcomed and staff provides fresh water bowls.

places.name: The William Vale
places.description: Luxury waterfront hotel with comprehensive pet program including dog beds, bowls, treats, and nearby park access.

places.name: 1 Hotels Brooklyn Bridge
places.description: Eco-luxury hotel offering pet-friendly accommodations with custom dog beds, organic treats, and park maps.

places.name: Kimpton Hotel Eventi
places.description: Kimpton brand hotel offering their signature pet-friendly program with no size restrictions, beds, and treats for dogs.

places.name: BARK

places.description: Premier dog grooming and daycare facility with spa-like grooming services and supervised play areas.

places.name: Doggy Village
places.description: Full-service grooming salon offering baths, haircuts, and spa treatments in a calm, dog-friendly environment.

places.address: East 34th Street Ferry Landing, New York, NY 10016

places.name: The High Line
places.description: Elevated park walkway welcoming leashed dogs with beautiful gardens, art installations, and city views.
